plot: In Los Angeles, a Norwegian cab driver has one of his own countrymen as a passenger. The passenger changes everything for him in the most terrible and unexpected way.
title: The Norwegian
plot_es: In Los Angeles, a Norwegian cab driver has one of his own countrymen as a passenger. The passenger changes everything for him in the most terrible and unexpected way.
plot_en: In Los Angeles, a Norwegian cab driver has one of his own countrymen as a passenger. The passenger changes everything for him in the most terrible and unexpected way.
